name: Abandon Starship
description:
The ship's condition is critical. In moments it will become some of the endless pieces of debris smeared across the void. Captain, you have only seconds to rally your crew and board the escape pods. Good luck.

This is a game created for the One Minute Jam, challenging devs to create a game that lasts exactly a minute.

The majority of sprites are thanks to Petricake Games' Cosmic Lilac Tileset.
